data.name: HCR321
data.description: Hello! My name is HCR321, and I mostly stream RPGs, puzzle-games, and other single-player games with some multiplayer games on the side. I try to keep my streams super chill and casual, and I love to chat about whatever with whoever is watching!

data.name: Streamers Name
data.description: Hunter is a senior Archaeology major. His favorite games are fetch and belly rubs.
